attributes.action: allow the BBC to allow the expansion of BBC local radio stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BBC local radio stations have provided a vital service to their local communities for more than 40 years. 

However many communities are underserved by their nearest BBC local station which often cover large county areas.

Now that ultra-local BBC TV has been withdrawn, let BBC local radio (a much cheaper media to produce) provide that service.
